name: KrispyLamb
text: My favorite pizza place! Love the flavors on the crust! Try the garlic butter with sesame seeds!

name: Chris Gerken
text: We had such high hopes for this chain.  But after numerous wrong orders and slow delivery service, we stopped having it delivered and would only get take out. The attached picture of a pepperoni  pizza was not the last straw. The order ‚Ä¶More

name: Kara Baynes
text: Staff member Alanna Heller is absolutely wonderful! Perfect atttiude , great costumer service and amazing pizza! I will definitely be back. Thank you Alanna!

name: Jeffery King
text: Menu was easy to find what you wanted.  Delivery was right on time and the lady delivering  was very nice and friendly. Will definitely order from Hungry Howie's again.

name: allison keller
text: Great and amazing Pizza. Love the choices of crust flavors. One of the top two pizza places in Statesville. Wait time is usually a bit longer than one would like or expect, and that is the only reason it did not get five stars.

name: Judy Britton
text: The pizza was excellent. We got the onion crust and the toppings were generous. We also got the antipasto salad which was the best version of this salad we have had in a long time. The order was ready on time. The owner, operator was kind and helpful. We will definitely be coming back and highly recommend this pizza shop.

name: Donna Cee
text: I love this place! The people are always nice and the food is always delicious!

name: Shawn Schott
text: Great pizza friendly staff and food is hot and on time!
